{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Usage 

This item is used in [Scripted interaction](/scriptedInteraction/).
* Very helpful when going through a storm.
** Fasten your helmsman to the helm, preventing them from falling overboard.
** Ask for [Tekēhu](/tekehu/)'s help.
** Save your crew when they fall overboard, require [Deckhand](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembersJobs/) 3 to succeed.
